description: This file defines a Flutter widget named CategorySelector that displays a horizontally scrollable list of categories, allowing users to select one. It utilizes Flutter's Material package and a custom theme for styling.

classes.name: CategorySelector
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of category chips for selection, highlighting the active category and invoking a callback when a category is selected.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the CategorySelector, creating a horizontal list of ChoiceChips representing categories.
